meanings.definition: Unnilhexiums: a chemical element with the atomic number 106.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study unnilhexiums to learn more about its properties.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes unnilhexiums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When the unnilhexiums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between unnilhexiums.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of unnilhexiums was a groundbreaking moment in science.

meanings.definition: Unnilhexiums: a group of atoms or molecules that have the same number of unnilhexium atoms.
meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the unnilhexiums to understand their structure.
meanings.sent2: In the experiment, they observed how unnilhexiums interacted with other elements.
meanings.sent3: The unnilhexiums in the beaker seemed to be having a party of their own!
meanings.sent4: The unity among the unnilhexiums reminded her of a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the unnilhexiums' symmetry was mesmerizing.
